contentrichtext.text: {{notability|Products|date=December 2009}} {{primarysources|date=December 2009}} {{lowercase|title=jIRC}} Written entirely in [[Java (programming language)|Java]], '''jIRC''' is a [[World Wide Web|web]]-based [[Java applet]] that allows users to connect to any [[Internet Relay Chat|IRC]] server through a [[web browser]]. ==See also== *[[List of IRC clients]] *[[Comparison of IRC clients]] ==External articles== * http://sourceforge.net/projects/jircwin/ {{IRC clients}} [[Category:Internet Relay Chat clients]] [[Category:Java Internet Relay Chat clients]] {{IRC-stub}}
